text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Gosh, I've really done it this time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen's injury seems to be more<n>serious than I
thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll be getting a proper diagnosis<n>soon, but it seems I'll
have to give up<n>on the Takarazuka Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No need to look so glum. It's<n>unfortunate, but I still have my
third<n>consecutive win in the Tenno Sho to<n>work toward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The race means a lot to me, and if<n>I'm to accomplish this
feat, I must<n>focus on recovery above all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This does mean I'll be unable to train<n>with you, but I'm sure
the other team<n>members will fill my place.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Our trainer, your teammates—myself<n>included—we all have
high hopes for<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So please, show us a race that will<n>light a fire in our hearts.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Okay... I'll run with everything I have.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Anyhow, I'll be fine with just<n>Trainer here. Rice,
you'd best get back<n>to your training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I'll check in on you again later.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She heads out with determination<n>written on her face.
Perhaps she was<n>roused by McQueen's words.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
...Seeing her now, I sense a<n>mysterious power. One that will
pull us<n>all forward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's right. Having such a hard<n>worker in their midst has
done<n>wonders for the rest of the team.
choice_data_list:
Guess that means you can focus on getting
better.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. I'll need to work just as hard<n>as her if I'm to make
a full recovery.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Filling the hole left by McQueen's<n>absence brings the entire
team<n>together in helping Rice train.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Okay Rice, start following me now.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it. Follow the leader.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Rice is so good atthis.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hard at work, I see. Looks like her<n>training is a boon to the
entire team.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You can say that again. My legs are<n>shaking like a newborn
goat's.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey, now that you can't exercise,<n>you better watch that
weight. I saw<n>those extra helpings of dessert<n>yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Y-you saw that?! Blame the pudding<n>for being excessively
flavorsome!<n>I've done nothing wrong!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Desserts aside, Rice is really coming<n>into form.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you and the others. Y'all<n>being there pushes her
to work<n>harder.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If anything, seeing her work so hardgives me strength.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Welp, I'm gonna go run my<n>heart out. Go lie down or
something!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hey! ...Ugh, she's just rubbing it in<n>because she knows
how much I'm<n>itching to run again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With everyone working together,<n>training proceeds
smoothly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ooh... I'm so nervous...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. Learn to revel in this feeling,<n>nerves and all.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Rice, you've got this! Just think of all<n>the training we did!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah... I worked hard for this. I'm<n>going to have fun, and...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And get my win against Mihono<n>Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yeah! That's what I like to hear!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: We'll be cheering for you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thanks. Okay, well, here goes!
choice_data_list:
Get behind Bourbon, and don't let her get
away!

Get behind Bourbon, and don't let her get
away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it! Follow the leader!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I want to win. She last spoke those<n>words to me back on
the ferris wheel.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Now it's time for her to prove how<n>much she really wants it.
